item.title: 2006Memorys Client [317/377] - Adding in custom items
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

I’m trying to add in custom items to my 2006Memorys client, and I can’t seem to find an effective way of doing that. What I have right now is this:

[code=java] File file = new File(Signlink.findcachedir() + “/models/”);
if (!file.exists()){
file.mkdirs();
}
if (file.exists()) {
File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
int amount = 0;
int lastPerc = 0;
for (File aFileArray : fileArray) {

                int percentage = amount++ / fileArray.length * 100;
                if (Math.round(percentage) > lastPerc){
                    lastPerc = Math.round(percentage);
                    drawLoadingText(70, "Loading models - " + lastPerc + "%");
                }
                try {
                    Integer.parseInt(aFileArray.getName());
                } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
                    continue;
                }
                String sss = aFileArray.getName();
                byte[] buffer = ReadFile(Signlink.findcachedir() + "/models/" + sss);
                Model.method460(buffer, Integer.parseInt(sss));
            }
        }[/code]

This is what I found off some other client, and I adjusted it to mine. Can anyone help me?

Read full topic
